metadata.synopsis: Dialogue for the lazy bear sleeping next to the elevator after the den has been attacked.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game 2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe readyattackonden4. Go blow the horn and side with the tieflings (kill all goblins).5. goto 244.59, 15.62, 490.716. Talk with Tuffet.

0.speaker: Tuffet
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: She has a very big yawn between finally and quiet. She's still half asleep.NodeContext: She has a very big yawn between finally and quiet. She's still half asleep.
